Description: A grid consisting of letters is to be checked against a dictionary of words. The user can input a value for the rows and columns of the grid and the program will create a grid of random characters. The program will read in a dictionary file (100,000 words) and use an algorithm to solve the word puzzle. The program outputs the elapsed time.

A simple browser-based 2D game using HTML5/CSS3. Designed the game objects using HTML5 canvas and sprites. The game engine was built from scratch using only Vanilla JavaScript. My love for JavaScript and front-end development started from here.

The same website you are browsing. Built using Angular 6, HTML5 and CSS3. Most of the animations and styles are designed and coded from scratch without using any external UI/UX frameworks. The designs are inspired from various articles and many other intriguing websites I visited which made me think, How did he do that?! I plan to constantly update the website and use it as my playground to learn and implement new web technologies.
An android chat application like WhatsApp, WeChat., where users will have an option to play games with each other. It is still in development.

Unix V6 file system has a current limitation of 16MB on file size. Redesigned the file system to remove this limitation and support files upto 4GB size. Supported Commands: initfs | ls | cd | cpin | cpout | mkdir | load | q
